{{Description|The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.}}
'''Lightning Fang''' is [[Razor]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* While Lightning Fang is active, Razor's Normal Attacks will deal bonus hits of {{Color|Electro DMG}}, whose base scaling is a percentage of the scaling for Razor's Normal Attack, [[Steel Fang]].
* {{TalentNote|icd|Soul Companion DMG}}
** This bonus {{Color|Electro DMG}} will not increase with buffs to Normal Attack damage, such as the bonuses from the [[Martial Artist]] or [[Gladiator's Finale]] artifact sets, [[Superconduct]], or buffs to {{Color|Physical DMG}} (%).
** It will increase with buffs to ATK, {{Color|Electro DMG}} (%), and Elemental Burst DMG (%), and will also vary proportionally in respect to each attack of Razor's 4-attack hit chain, as the scaling for each of Razor's Normal Attacks is different.
* While active, Razor gains [[Electro]] status, allowing him to imbue certain [[Anemo]] attacks with Electro [[Elemental Absorption]].
* {{TalentNote|ascension|1|Awakening|resets the cooldown of [[Claw and Thunder]] upon using Lightning Fang.|character=Razor|talent=Lightning Fang}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Soul Companion}}
